about_the_game:
Without fear, you signed the contract which would forever sever your ties to the world above, and now it is your sworn duty to brave the abyss and uncover the secrets of the old world. Your death is guaranteed, but so is your status as a legend.

Gameplay

The ever-shifting abyss provides an adequate challenge to fearless dungeoneers, but don't get too reckless as you only have one life to prove yourself with. Central to this plight is the dynamic of holding your position and pushing ever forward as hoards of monsters try to break your foothold; they are quite numerous afterall, and you'd do well to stand your ground. Don't stall for too long however, or a terrifying force might make itself known and attempt to steal your glory!

Features

  • 20+ playable characters.
  • 10+ uniquely themed floors to fight your way through.
  • 50+ handcrafted maps with randomized elements (such as enemy types, key locations, entrance/exit locations, ect.) Maps are randomly selected from a map pool.
  • Complex level layouts with multiple routing options.
  • Permadeath with meta progression in the form of a permanent upgrade shop.
  • Shop upgrades that enable increased rewards and difficulty.
  • Lots and lots of bullet hell.
  • Accessible, minimalistic control scheme (twin-stick shooter).
  • Supports multiple aspect ratios, including 4:3, 16:9, 16:10, and 21:9.
  • Supports keyboard/mouse and gamepad input, with the option to rebind both.
  • 1-4 players, local co-op (playable online with Steam Remote Play).

name: Pixel Descent

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Pixel Descent is an action rogue-lite in which you navigate a series of complex dungeons packed to the brim with monsters that want you dead. Sign the contract and descend into the deepest depths of the abyss knowing full well that you will definitely die there, it's just a matter of when.
